title: Can i  please have my leaver breaker reset.
body:
Can i please please please have my leaver breaker reset or taken off as its on 20 minutes and i am 13 so i get called to do things so i try and do something to stop me leaving so im afk a bit this is about 5-10 minutes not a game changer anyway but i really want my leaver breaker to be taken off. so i can actually play because i will be waiting for leaver breaker 2o minutes gone 1:30 minute wait and the game starts thats about 30 minutes so now i have spent 51 minutes playing.
So please un ban me

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately LeaverBuster penalties cannot be removed or reduced, the system is set up in such a way to prevent taint.

For more information about Leaverbuster and how the system works, check out the [LeaverBuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).

thanks that clears some questions but i have 1 more if you can answer it will my timer ever go down say after my 5 games. so like 20 minutes leaver breaker 5 games played will it go back down to 5 minutes
